objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#E8D0B8'/><defs><radialGradient id='mainGradient' cx='540' cy='540' r='400' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#F2E6D8'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#E8D0B8'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#D4A76A'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#C49355'/></linearGradient></defs><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='#F2E6D8' stroke='#D4A76A' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='310' fill='none' stroke='#D4A76A' stroke-width='1' stroke-dasharray='8,6'/><circle cx='840' cy='400' r='130' fill='url(#accentGradient)'/><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='30' fill='#C49355'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='25' fill='#C49355'/><circle cx='200' cy='800' r='20' fill='#C49355'/><circle cx='750' cy='150' r='15' fill='#C49355'/></g><path d='M300 150 L350 100' stroke='#D4A76A' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M750 900 L800 950' stroke='#D4A76A' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M150 600 L100 650' stroke='#D4A76A' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M950 500 L980 480' stroke='#D4A76A' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#mainGradient)' opacity='0.3'/></svg>

objects.text: • SPACIOUS DESIGN • DURABLE MATERIAL • GOLD ACCENTS

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
The banner features a sophisticated and modern design that showcases a premium tote bag. The layout is centered around a large, high-quality product image ("product_image") set against a soft radial gradient background ("background"). The banner includes a bold, uppercase headline ("heading") and a supporting subheading ("subheading") in elegant, serif typography, both balanced at the top center. A circular price tag ("price") is positioned prominently to the right of the product. At the bottom, a slim line of product features ("description") highlights key selling points in uppercase text. A clear call-to-action button ("cta" with "cta_background") invites the viewer to engage.

**Color Palette**:
- Background Beige: `#E8D0B8`
- Accent Gold: `#C49355`, `#D4A76A`
- Text Brown: `#8B4513`, `#A0522D`
- Price Badge Gradient: from `#D4A76A` to `#C49355`
- Button Text: `#FFFFFF`
- Price Text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated handbag featuring a rich camel brown as the base color (Hex: #B37A5E), which lends a warm and elegant tone. The texture of the leather adds depth, subtly breaking the uniformity. Gold metallic accents (Hex: #D4AF37) on the hardware, logo, and decorative charms create a stylish contrast, offering visual highlights while complementing the brown. The colors are blended seamlessly with gold enhancing the luxury element. For an advertisement banner, a refined palette of Camel Brown (#B37A5E), Polished Gold (#D4AF37), Ivory (#F6F1EB), and Charcoal Gray (#3F3F3F) would communicate class, warmth, and sophistication effectively.
